Package com.rubynaxela.kyanite.game.entities

Interface MovingEntity

All Known Subinterfaces:
GravityAffected
All Known Implementing Classes:
Particle
public interface MovingEntity
Objects that implement MovingEntity are being moved automatically by the scene loop. This interface also provides the ability to limit available movement area through barriers.

    Detects collision of this object with another axis-aligned rectangle object and blocks the movement of this object so that it stops at the specified barrier.

  • Method Details

    • getVelocity

      @NotNull @NotNull Vector2f getVelocity()
      Returns:
      the velocity vector of this object

    • setVelocity

      void setVelocity(@NotNull @NotNull Vector2f velocity)
      Sets the velocity vector of this object. This object will move automatically with this velocity.
      Parameters:
      velocity - the new velocity vector of this object

    • move

      void move(@NotNull @NotNull Vector2f offset)
      Moves this object by the specified offset.
      Parameters:
      offset - the offset vector added to the current position.

    • stopAtBarrier

      default void stopAtBarrier(@NotNull @NotNull Object barrier, @NotNull @NotNull Time deltaTime)
      Detects collision of this object with another axis-aligned rectangle object and blocks the movement of this object so that it stops at the specified barrier.
      Parameters:
      barrier - a stationary axis-aligned rectangle object (GlobalRect, FloatRect, Shape, or Sprite)
      deltaTime - the time difference between the last two scene frames (typically from the AnimatedEntity.animate(com.rubynaxela.kyanite.util.Time, com.rubynaxela.kyanite.util.Time) method)
